summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary telephonic interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with a former Senior Customer Support Representative from Signet Electronic Systems, Inc. The interview pertains to the OIG investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein, focusing on technical support and upgrades to the camera system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York around August 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, subject of the OIG death investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary telephonic interview of the former Signet employee as part of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary telephonic interview of the former Signet employee as part of the OIG investigation.

events.title: OIG Interview of Signet Employee
events.description: Special Agent and Senior Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary telephonic interview of a former Senior Customer Support Representative from Signet Electronic Systems, Inc., regarding technical support for the MCC New York camera system around August 2019.

events.title: Camera System Support at MCC New York
events.description: The former Signet employee assisted MCC New York with their camera system technical support and upgrades around August 2019, a period relevant to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is investigating the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

The investigation includes interviewing a former Senior Customer Support Representative from Signet Electronic Systems, Inc., who provided technical support for the camera system at MCC New York around August 2019.
The interview was recorded and transcribed on September 22, 2021.
A related document, Signet Service Request #24975 dated August 8, 2019 for MCC New York, is referenced as an attachment.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum containing no recommendations or conclusions, and its distribution is restricted.
